snippet.title: Wildmender | Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
🎯Steam Winter Sale !20% OFF Wildmender! - 18:00 GMT Thursday December 21st 2023 until 18:00 GMT Thursday January 4th 2024

🎮Playstation Winter Sale !20% OFF! Wildmender will also be on sale on the Playstation Store (for PS5) from midnight Japan time Wednesday December 20th 2023 until midnight Japan time Friday January 5th 2024 ⚠️25% off for PS Plus users

🌿 Wildmender Connect
☀️ Wildmender - https://bit.ly/wildmender
💬 Official Discord - https://bit.ly/wildmenderdiscord

🎮KWALEE PC+CONSOLE GAMES
⚔️ The Spirit of the Samurai - https://bit.ly/spiritofthesamurai
🚓 The Precinct - https://bit.ly/theprecinctgame
☀️ Wildmender - https://bit.ly/wildmender
🔫 ROBOBEAT - https://bit.ly/robobeat
🔪 Space Chef - https://bit.ly/spacechefgame
😈 Scathe - https://bit.ly/scathegame
